testcase.name: Cart button1
testcase.system-out: Given User on home page1....................................................passed Then Click each tab on yellow banner. User should navigate to the Cart page after clicking the Cart icon button1.passed

testcase.name: Changing quantity of product in the Cart2
testcase.system-out: Given Click the category tab on Home page to product page2..................passed When Click the chosen product and click Add to cart button2.................passed And Click Cart Icon button2.................................................passed Then Verify User able to change the quantity of product in the Cart2........passed

testcase.name: Go shopping button3
testcase.system-out: Given Click Cart icon button3...............................................passed When User should be able to see and click Go Shopping button3...............passed Then Go Shopping button navigates to the homepage3..........................passed
